spirit:field.spirit:name: vid_color_format
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP video color format 2'b00: RGB888 2'b01: YCbCr444 2'b10: YCbCr422 2'b11: YCbCr420

spirit:field.spirit:name: apb_to_axi_mode_select
spirit:field.spirit:description: APB to AXI read mode select 1'b1: The read cycle is at least one clock later than read address cycle 1'b0: The read cycle happens at the same cycle as read address cycle

spirit:field.spirit:name: enh_frm_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP enhanced framing mode enable. The enhanced mode is enabled when this bit is set to 1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane_bit_rate
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP serial bit rate 2'b00: RBR (1.62 Gbps) 2'b01: HBR (2.70 Gbps) 2'b10: HBR2 (5.40 Gbps) 2'b11: HBR3(8.10 Gbps)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane_num
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of active dp lanes 2'b00: 1 lane 2'b01: 2 lanes 2'b10: Invalid 2'b11: 4 lanes

spirit:field.spirit:name: lanes_not_aligned
spirit:field.spirit:description: Alignment is not correct even though bond_align_done is set to high

spirit:field.spirit:name: bond_align_done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Alignment and bonding status. A "1" indicates all active lanes are bonded and aligned

spirit:field.spirit:name: lanes_not_aligned_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of clock cycles where lanes are not aligned after detection is enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: lanes_not_aligned_cnt_rst
spirit:field.spirit:description: Align detector logic enable 1'b0: Disable 1'b1: Enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: lanes_align_det_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: Align detector logic enable 1'b0: Disable 1'b1: Enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
FIFO overflow status. A "1" indicates overflow in FIFO.
Bit[12] corresponds to lane 0 FIFO Bit[13] corresponds to lane 1 FIFO Bit[14] corresponds to lane 2 FIFO Bit[15] corresponds to lane 3 FIFO

spirit:field.spirit:name: underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description:
FIFO underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in FIFO.
Bit[8] corresponds to lane 0 FIFO Bit[9] corresponds to lane 1 FIFO Bit[10] corresponds to lane 2 FIFO Bit[11] corresponds to lane 3 FIFO

spirit:field.spirit:name: full
spirit:field.spirit:description:
FIFO full status. A "1" indicates FIFO is full
Bit[4] corresponds to lane 0 FIFO Bit[5] corresponds to lane 1 FIFO Bit[6] corresponds to lane 2 FIFO Bit[7] corresponds to lane 3 FIFO

spirit:field.spirit:name: empty
spirit:field.spirit:description:
FIFO empty status. A "1" indicates FIFO is empty
Bit[0] corresponds to lane 0 FIFO Bit[1] corresponds to lane 1 FIFO Bit[2] corresponds to lane 2 FIFO Bit[3] corresponds to lane 3 FIFO

spirit:field.spirit:name: depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth. This value is used for the build

spirit:field.spirit:name: lanes_with_8b10b_nit_err_post_cr
spirit:field.spirit:description: There are 8b10b not in table decoder errors

spirit:register.spirit:name: cnt_en_rst_8b10b_1
spirit:register.spirit:description: 8b10b not in table error counts reset

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane3_8b10b_nit_err_post_cr_cnt_rst
spirit:field.spirit:description: 8b10b not in table error reset on lane 3

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane2_8b10b_nit_err_post_cr_cnt_rst
spirit:field.spirit:description: 8b10b not in table error reset on lane 2

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane1_8b10b_nit_err_post_cr_cnt_rst
spirit:field.spirit:description: 8b10b not in table error reset on lane 1

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane0_8b10b_nit_err_post_cr_cnt_rst
spirit:field.spirit:description: 8b10b not in table error reset on lane 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: lanes_8b10b_nit_err_det_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: 8b10b not in table error detector enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane3_8b10b_dis_err_post_cr_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of 8b10b disparity errors on lane 3

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane2_8b10b_dis_err_post_cr_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of 8b10b disparity errors on lane 2

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane1_8b10b_dis_err_post_cr_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of 8b10b disparity errors on lane 1

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane0_8b10b_dis_err_post_cr_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of 8b10b disparity errors on lane 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane3_8b10b_nit_err_post_cr_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of 8b10b not in table errors on lane 3

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane2_8b10b_nit_err_post_cr_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of 8b10b not in table errors on lane 2

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane1_8b10b_nit_err_post_cr_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of 8b10b not in table errors on lane 1

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane0_8b10b_nit_err_post_cr_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of 8b10b not in table errors on lane 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt3_rxbyterealign_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of clock cycles where gt3 symbol is realigned

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt2_rxbyterealign_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of clock cycles where gt2 symbol is realigned

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt1_rxbyterealign_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of clock cycles where gt1 symbol is realigned

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_gt0_rxbyterealign_cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of clock cycles where gt0 symbol is realigned

spirit:field.spirit:name: enable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Descrambler enable bit. The descrambler is enabled when this bit is set to 1. It is bypassed when this bit is set to 0.

spirit:field.spirit:name: drop_sdp_ptp_pkt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Drop SDP packets going to MCA

spirit:field.spirit:name: drop_cs_ptp_pkt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Drop CS packets going to MCA

spirit:field.spirit:name: y_only
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bit 7 field for Y-only video

spirit:field.spirit:name: stereo
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bits 2:1 field for Stereo video attribute 0 = No 3D video

spirit:field.spirit:name: int_total
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bit 0 field for interlaced video

spirit:field.spirit:name: color
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_0 bits 7:1 for the Colorimetry field See DP 1.2 page 78 0x00 = RGB 18bpp 0x10 = RGB 24bpp 0x20 = RGB 30bpp 0x30 = RGB 36bpp 0x40 = RGB 48bpp

spirit:field.spirit:name: clk_sync
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_0 bit 0 for synchronous clock. 0 = Link and main video clock are asynchronous 1 = Link and main video clock are synchronous

spirit:field.spirit:name: msa_majority_fail
spirit:field.spirit:description: MSA majority rule status. A "1" indicates that the majority rule failed

spirit:field.spirit:name: y_only
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bit 7 field for Y-only video

spirit:field.spirit:name: stereo
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bits 2:1 field for Stereo video attribute 0 = No 3D video

spirit:field.spirit:name: int_total
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bit 0 field for interlaced video

spirit:field.spirit:name: color
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_0 bits 7:1 for the Colorimetry field See DP 1.2 page 78 0x00 = RGB 18bpp 0x10 = RGB 24bpp 0x20 = RGB 30bpp 0x30 = RGB 36bpp 0x40 = RGB 48bpp

spirit:field.spirit:name: clk_sync
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_0 bit 0 for synchronous clock. 0 = Link and main video clock are asynchronous 1 = Link and main video clock are synchronous

spirit:field.spirit:name: state_vid_status
spirit:field.spirit:description: state_vid_status 3'b000: e_wait_sr 3'b001: e_wait_vb 3'b010: e_wait_be 3'b011: e_valid 3'b100: e_dummy

spirit:field.spirit:name: vbd_majority_fail
spirit:field.spirit:description: VBID majority rule status. A "1" indicates that the majority rule failed

spirit:field.spirit:name: depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth. This value is used for the build

spirit:field.spirit:name: overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO overflow status. A "1" indicates overflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status. A "1" indicates FIFO is full

spirit:field.spirit:name: empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status. A "1" indicates FIFO is empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO overflow status. A "1" indicates overflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status. A "1" indicates FIFO is full

spirit:field.spirit:name: empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status. A "1" indicates FIFO is empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth. This value is used for the build

spirit:field.spirit:name: depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth. This value is used for the build

spirit:register.spirit:name: debug
spirit:register.spirit:description: SDP The SS and SE symbols' byte number

spirit:field.spirit:name: ss_se_same_cycle_byte_num
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth. This value is used for the build

spirit:field.spirit:name: handshake
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of images with a fault on handshake (vid_enbl='1' while vid_ready='0')

spirit:field.spirit:name: last_early
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of images with pixel_last flag assert too early (line is too small)

spirit:field.spirit:name: last_late
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of images with pixel_last flag assert too late (line is too long)

spirit:field.spirit:name: first
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of images with pixel_first flag at the wrong position

spirit:field.spirit:name: last_early
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of images with line_last flag assert too early (line is too small)

spirit:field.spirit:name: last_late
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of images with line_last flag assert too late (line is too long)

spirit:field.spirit:name: first
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of images with line_first flag at the wrong position

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: stats0
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: All the Statistic Registers and their configuration.

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: stats1
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: All the Statistic Registers and their configuration.

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: sdp_pkt_sent_cnt
spirit:register.spirit:description: SDP Number of PTP packets sent

spirit:register.spirit:name: sdp_pkt_sent_cnt_watermark
spirit:register.spirit:description: SDP Number of packets sent watermark

spirit:register.spirit:name: sdp_ss_se_same_cycle
spirit:register.spirit:description: SDP number of clock cycles with ss and se

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable register - Write 1 to enable, 0 to mask an interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: tu_size_rdy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Set high to enable tu_size_rdy interrupt

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which enabled interrupts have triggered, Write 1 to clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: tu_size_rdy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Registered tu_size_rdy 1: TU size value is ready to be read 0: TU is not ready or not applicable

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending_irq
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which enabled interrupts have triggered, Write 1 to clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: tu_size_rdy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Registered tu_size_rdy 1: TU size value is ready to be read 0: TU is not ready or not applicable

spirit:register.spirit:name: raw
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the registered state of interrupt signals

variant.name: none
variant.doc: 'none' variant states including all templates which are not assigned any variant property.
